description: Ryuu is also member of Sawako`s group of friends. He is quiet most of the time and rarely talks, but still can communicate well with Sawako, as they both don`t talk much anyway. He is a close childhood friend with Chizuru and does not deny having feelings for her. Ryuu and Kazehaya became friends when they were on the baseball team during middle school.
name: Sanada Ryuu
